content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

```julia
function find(arr)
    # Sort the input array
    sort!(arr)
    
    # Find the middle index of the sorted array
    mid = length(arr) รท 2 + 1
    
    # If the number of elements in the array is even, return the average of the two middle elements
    if length(arr) % 2 == 0
        return (arr[mid - 1] + arr[mid]) / 2
    end
    
    # Otherwise, return the element at the middle index
    return arr[mid]
end
```
Example:
```julia
julia> find([3, 5, 7, 9, 11])
6.0
```
